Sentencas: The integrated solar energy hybrid system combines decentralized, energy-efficient approaches to various energy production methods, offering benefits such as improved efficiency, emissions reduction, cost-effectiveness, sustainability and reliability.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: Thus, in this study, the optimal design of a solar-fossil-fuel-based combined cooling, heating, power and freshwater generation system is presented.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: The main prime movers for generating power and heat concurrently are considered gas engines, diesel engines, gas turbines, and solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: The suggested system configuration contains a prime mover, two chillers, auxiliary boiler, desalination unit, parabolic trough collectors, photovoltaic panels, proton exchange membrane electrolyzer, thermal and cooling storage tanks.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: The genetic algorithm is considered as the optimization method for determining the lowest total annual cost.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: Various decision parameters are considered in this assessment, including the prime mover's capacity and operating under 12 partial loads, the number of prime movers, mass flow rate of the solar parabolic trough collectors, the electric cooling ratio, operation of 16 partial loads for chillers (with each chiller accommodating 8 partial loads), capacity of the auxiliary boiler, thermal and cooling energy storage tank capacities, number of photovoltaic panels, and the isentropic efficiency of the high pressure pump.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: The total annual cost comprises economic, energy, and environmental factors.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: Notably, the current system permits the purchase or sale of electricity to the grid.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: The optimal results disclosed a reduction of 27.08 %, 13.83 %, and a 23.80 % in the total annual cost of the system including the gas engine compared to the system with solid oxide fuel cell, diesel engine, and gas turbine, respectively.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: Furthermore, the system with solid oxide fuel cell showed fuel energy savings ratios of 48.6 %, 38.26 %, and 24.46 %, respectively, compared to the system including gas turbine, gas engine, and diesel engine.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: Additionally, in comparison to systems with solid oxide fuel cell, diesel engine, and gas turbine, the exergy efficiency of the system with gas engine is higher approximately 40.31 %, 3.04 %, and 92.50 %, respectively.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: The optimum total annual cost and exergy efficiency were determined to be 1.6708 x106 $/year and 42.08 %, respectively, for the system utilizing the gas engine.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage

Sentencas: Eventually, the comparison and analysis of optimal results from energy, exergy, economic and environmental perspectives were presented.
Titulo: Evaluation & optimization of solar-fossil-fuel-based multi-generation system with energy storage
